melesa nam athi gal dolahe, mudra katayam men, ek ek galaka gothra dolahe nam eka eka bagin thibiya yuthu ya. 22 laya wasma sandaha da thani ranin ekata gethu mala sadiya yuthu yi. 23 laya wasmata ran mudu dekak sada ee ran mudu deka laya wasme dekelaware damiya yuthu yi. 24 gethu ran mala deka laya wasme dekelaware athi mudu deke aminiya yuthu we. 25 gethu mala deke anith dekelawara da ran keweni dekata amuna, eewa eepod sattaye ura pati pita issarahin thabiya yuthu yi. 26 ran walalu dekak da sada, laya wasme pahatha watiye dekelaware eepod sattaya desata wana paridi eewa athulu paththen sawi kala yuthu ya. 27 thawath ran walalu dekak sada, eepod sattayata yatin depaththe ura pati deka pita, muttuwa langa geththam kala bandapatiyata udin damiya yuthu ya. 28 laya wasma eepod sattaye walaluwalata nil pahathi patiyakin banda pinisath, eya eepod sattayen burul nowi pawathina pinisath ehi walalu eepod sattaye walaluwalata nil pahathi patiyakin banda yuthu ya. 29 aaron da shuddhasthanayata athulu wana wita, samindanan wahanse wana ma idiriyehi nithara pawathina sihi wimak wana pinisa thama laya matha athi winishchaye laya wasmehi ishrayel janayage nama dariya yuthu ya. 30 winishchaye laya wasmehi urim saha thummim yana pasa ata damiya yuthu we.
